data.title: Beer, Wine, and Spirits
data.meta_description: With classic American chophouses in mind, Wissota features Certified Angus Beef, an excellent variety of seafood, and creative sides.
data.text:
Lighter Side

Outboard Cream Ale Cream Ale / 5.0 ABV / 14.0 IBU / Milwaukee, WI Outboard cream ale is brewed with a blend of malted barley and corn grits resulting in a light body and golden straw color. A slight hop presence balances out this simple / but extremely refreshing beer. 16oz Draft 6

3 Sheeps Pils Pilsner - German / 5.3 ABV / Sheboygan, WI German style pilsner brewed with cascade hops 16oz Draft 6

Sandy Cheeks Wheat Beer - Hefeweizen / 5.5 ABV / 12.0 IBU / Verona, WI Enjoy island time anytime with this award-winning classic hefeweizen infused with real pineapple. 16oz Draft 7

Point Special Lager Lager - American / 4.8 ABV / 9.0 IBU / Stevens Point, WI The brewery’s flagship brew since 1857 / point special is a well-balanced / full-bodied classic american-style lager. This award-winning pilsner is highly praised for its pleasant hop aroma and smooth / hearty flavor. 16oz Draft 6

Classic Amber Lager - American Amber / Red / 4.9 ABV / 14.0 IBU / Stevens Point, WI Point classic amber is a multi-award winning amber-style lager. It boasts a recipe of the highest quality natural ingredients. Roasted caramel malts gives the beer its subtle caramel character and reddish-amber hue. American tettnanger hops provide a soft sweetness and gentle hop aroma. The result is a distinctive flavorful beer that is remarkably smooth and clean. 16oz Draft 7

Louie's Demise Red Ale - American Amber / Red / 5.5 ABV / 24.0 IBU / Milwaukee, WI Our flagship brand; this medium bodied amber ale starts with a rich malt flourish thatʼs kept in perfect balance by a smooth hop finish. 16oz Draft 7

Ale's & Ipa's

Honey Blonde Ale Honey Beer / 4.5 ABV / 12.0 IBU / Amherst, WI Made using real wisconsin honey / our honey blonde is a traditional cream ale featuring a breezy floral bouquet / subtle sweetness / and crisp / clean finish. When you're feeling like something a bit more refreshing / this little number is sure to please. 16oz Draft 7

Pineapple Fresh Coast Pale Ale - New England / Hazy / 4.8 ABV / Sheboygan, WI Our juicy pale ale kicked up with pineapple! 16oz Draft 7

Green Circle Pale Pale Ale - American / 5.6 ABV / Stevens Point, WI 16oz Draft 8

Green 19 Ipa - American / 6.4 ABV / 55.0 IBU / Green Bay, WI This hop-forward ale showcases a complex blend of citrus-like american hop varieties / their bitterness well-balanced by complex malt for exceptional drinkability. 16oz Draft 8

Life Of Illusion India Pale Ale Ipa - New England / Hazy / 7.4 ABV / Amherst, WI Ddh ipa with new zealand nectaron & sultana hops pow! Right between the eyes! We lucked out with a little surprise of new zealand nectaron hops / don't get used to this rare treat of a beer. Tropical fruit is a common descriptor for a lot of hops / but this brings something else to the table we can't describe without using every combination of fruit descriptor possible. Nectaron was originally just named "wow" because of it's unique flavor characteristics. juicy and drippy / this tasty ipa is the beer equivalent of one of those jumex nectar drinks. Soft tropical juice / with notes of pineapple that finishes with a slight sweetness. 10oz Draft 7

Dark Side

Cookies 'n Cream Stout - Pastry / 5.5 ABV / 18.0 IBU / Stevens Point, WI Dunk the little cookies and watch bubbles come up! This sessionable dessert stout recalls everyone's favorite sandwich cookie with a smooth / biscuity base of dark chocolate malt / softened with flavors of cream filling / speckled ice cream / and white chocolate. 16oz Draft 8

Nut Brown Ale Brown Ale - English / 5.8 ABV / 17.0 IBU / Ashland, WI Don’t be intimidated by the rich walnut color. This beer is really not heavy at all. It is very smooth with no bitterness / and has a real warming / nut-like flavor and aroma. Brewed to match a traditional english mild / it has carbonation levels that are more american. Our “flagship” brew / it’s a very social drink and goes great with all types of food. 16oz Draft 8

Jp's Casper White Stout Stout - White / Golden / 6.1 ABV / 9.0 IBU / Stevens Point, WI A white buffalo standing out from the herd of dark stouts. Gold in color / casper melds the creamy mouthfeel and coffee hints of a stout with the unexpected flavors of pilsner malt / white chocolate / and vanilla. It’s not a misnomer. It’s a casper. Stand apart. 16oz Draft 7

Vanilla Wafer Porter Porter / 7.0 ABV / Milwaukee, WI Vanilla wafer porter is a vanilla porter swirling with chocolate malt notes that will leave you floating in bliss. Smooth vanilla melds perfectly for a porter that's outtasight! 16oz Draft 8

Pretty Fly For A Maple Rye Stout - Imperial / 10.7 ABV / Amherst, WI A full bodied imperial stout that balances out the spicy characteristics of malted rye with a touch of sweetness from brown sugar and real wisconsin maple syrup. 10oz Snifter 9
